SEARCH
Package service

Interface AuthenticationService

All Known Implementing Classes:
AuthenticationServiceImpl
public interface AuthenticationService
Service interface for authentication operations. Handles user login, logout, and password management.
Since:
2025-10-07
Version:
1.0
Author:
SC2002 SCED Group-6

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    changePassword(User user, String oldPassword, String newPassword)
    Changes a user's password.
    boolean
    isAuthenticated(String userId)
    Validates if a user is currently authenticated.
    User
    login(String userId, String password)
    Authenticates a user with their credentials.
    void
    logout(String userId)
    Logs out the current user and terminates their session.
    void
    registerRepresentative(String representativeId, String name, String email, String password, String companyName, String industry, String position)
    Registers a new company representative (pending approval).

  • Method Details

    • login

      User login(String userId, String password)
      Authenticates a user with their credentials.
      Parameters:
      userId - The user's ID (student ID, staff ID, or email for representatives)
      password - The user's password
      Returns:
      The authenticated User object
      Throws:
      UnauthorizedException - if credentials are invalid
      ResourceNotFoundException - if user not found

    • logout

      void logout(String userId)
      Logs out the current user and terminates their session.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user to logout

    • changePassword

      void changePassword(User user, String oldPassword, String newPassword)
      Changes a user's password.
      Parameters:
      user - The user whose password is being changed
      oldPassword - The current password for verification
      newPassword - The new password to set
      Throws:
      UnauthorizedException - if old password is incorrect
      InvalidInputException - if new password is invalid

    • isAuthenticated

      boolean isAuthenticated(String userId)
      Validates if a user is currently authenticated.
      Parameters:
      userId - The user ID to check
      Returns:
      true if user is authenticated, false otherwise

    • registerRepresentative

      void registerRepresentative(String representativeId, String name, String email, String password, String companyName, String industry, String position)
      Registers a new company representative (pending approval).
      Parameters:
      representativeId - The representative ID
      name - The representative's name
      email - The representative's email
      password - The representative's password
      companyName - The company name
      industry - The company industry
      position - The representative's position/title
      Throws:
      InvalidInputException - if input is invalid
